ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] King Akanon
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, been that way for awhile now.  Varant may think it s cute or obvious to make the gnome king a clockwork, but I think it s rather lame.  Especially a King
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, been that way for awhile now. Varant may think it's cute or obvious to
make the gnome king a clockwork, but I think it's rather lame. Especially a
King who won't even talk to ya, unless you give him something ... then he'll
say Thanks. I also miss the giant gnome at the mills. Non-tinkering issue,
but wanted to voice my dislike of our Tin-King. >:-[

Kilkin Cobblepot

-----Original Message-----
From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 1:44 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] King Akanon


On Mon, Aug 28, 2000 at 07:48:47AM -0700, Quasinom de Plume wrote:
> Your link is dead - but if you're refering to the fact that he's know a
> clockwork - that WAS Verant's fix. I have no clue why they can't make him
> a Gnome...

Ack. My bad. Link is http://www.cws.org/~pasketti/pics/pask-ack.jpg

Yes, that's what I was referring to. I was expecting to see the small human
there, so it was quite a shock.

Pasketti of Povar
